TEXT.TITLE: CAMPBELL SOUP <CPB> TO SELL PLANT IN DELAWARE
TEXT.BODY: Campbell Soup co said it will sell its W.L. Wheatley ingredients plant in Clayton, Del., as a going operation. It said it will continue to operate the plant until a buyer is found. The sale is aimed at improving Campbell's return on assets, the company said. Reuter
